pullrequest.title: Slimmed down the Plugin pull request (no more template specializations)

content.raw: That's reasonable. At the very least, I should clarify in the function description of `GetInterface` that the pointer it returns will be invalidated when all references to the plugin instance are cleared, and that there is an alternative function for retrieving a reference-counting pointer to the interface.
content.html: That's reasonable. At the very least, I should clarify in the function description of GetInterface that the pointer it returns will be invalidated when all references to the plugin instance are cleared, and that there is an alternative function for retrieving a reference-counting pointer to the interface.
